seo.description: I am Higor Milani, a student at ATITUS, Test Automation and QA Engineer, as well as a Full Stack programmer, enthusiast of Cybersecurity, ML/AI, and Big Data.

home.description: Computer Science student at ATITUS, passionate about technology and software development. I work with QA, test automation, and Full Stack development, while also exploring areas like Big Data, cybersecurity, and artificial intelligence, always integrating different knowledge into my projects.

about.title: About
about.description: I am Higor Milani, I am {{age}} years old and I study Computer Science at ATITUS. I always try to embrace the different, I like to learn and experience new things, whenever I learn something new I try to implement or do something useful with that knowledge. I love technology, poetry, art, coffee and cats.
